Texture.name: CSPSSkBarIconPres
Texture.OnMouseUp: WINDOW_MANAGER:SetMouseCursor(0) if button==2 then CSPS.hbSkillRemove(self.i, self.j) end
Texture.OnDragStart: if button == 1 then WINDOW_MANAGER:SetMouseCursor(15) CSPS.onHbIconDrag(self.i,self.j) end

Texture.name: $(parent)CPCheck2
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.toggleCP(2) end

Texture.name: $(parent)CPCheck3
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.toggleCP(3) end

Texture.name: $(parent)CPCheck1
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.toggleCP(1) end

Texture.name: $(parent)ChkHotbar
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.toggleHotbar() end

Texture.name: $(parent)ChkOldCP
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.showElement("oldCP") end

Texture.name: $(parent)ChkCPReminder
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.toggleCPReminder() end

Texture.name: $(parent)ChkCPAutoOpen

Label.name: $(parent)LblAddBind
Label.text: Add special binding to this group

Label.name: $(grandparent)LblReverse
Label.text: Reverse order (use name → value instead of value → name)

Label.name: $(grandparent)LblCap
Label.text: Stop import when number of spendable points is reached
